mapper.update: update car set routeID = #{routeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carType = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carOrgin = #{carOrgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carProDate = #{carProDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carBuyDate = #{carBuyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carCapacity = #{carCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carstate = #{carstate,jdbcType=BIT}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where carID = #{carID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select carID, routeID, carType, carOrgin, carProDate, carBuyDate, carCapacity, carstate, Comment from car where carID = #{carID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select carID, routeID, carType, carOrgin, carProDate, carBuyDate, carCapacity, carstate, Comment from car
